column1: 0018|eighteen minutes past midnight|Instantaneously the oblong became a square; then that
column4: a faintly discerned shape etched in the darkness on the silent headland. Curious
column5: he looked at his watch. The time was eighteen minutes past midnight.

column2:
12:18 a.m.
[IN BED]
Michael doesn’t believe in Heaven or Hell. He’s got closer to death than most living people and he tells me there was no tunnel of light or dancing angels. I’m a bit disappointed
